review: So tired of trying to get this thing to work.  Trying to get it to hook up with my wifi connection is a nightmare. According to other comments online it uses tons of bandwidth and data, (as well as getting BLAZING hot) so I unplug it when not in use. EVERY SINGLE TIME I plug it back in is a nightmare. Kids are upset. I'm upset. Not worth $40.
author: Heather

review: I have Roku on one of my TV's and the Fire-stick on another and i find, so far, that the Roku seems to be much more organized and the Fire-stick seems to be more scrambled.I have just recently set up the Fire-stick and may be more pleased the more I use it.I am an Old Guy so maybe performance is not being up to the task but sincerely for me Roku is easier to operate.Old Guy
